DOC.brief_summary: In order make Cambodia independent import product treatment prevention malnutrition , UNICEF , DFPTQ Fisheries Administration IRD start collaboration development range product treatment prevention malnutrition . To reduce cost product , adapt taste local circumstance , protein source usual RUTF ( milk powder ) change fish ( Trey Riel ) . The main objective sub-study test efficacy newly develop RUTF recovery child suffer severe acute malnutrition . As comparison , current treatment SAM BP-100 use .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Locally Produced RUTF With Commercial RUTF Treatment SAM
DOC.criteria: discharge hospital admission SAM WHZ < 2.8 Zscore MUAC < 11.5 cm complication pass appetite test < 6 mo age complication relate SAM
